TypeSignature.Value: public class FlowDocumentScrollViewer : System.Windows.Controls.Control, IServiceProvider, System.Windows.Markup.IAddChild
.class public auto ansi FlowDocumentScrollViewer extends System.Windows.Controls.Control implements class System.IServiceProvider, class System.Windows.Markup.IAddChild
Public Class FlowDocumentScrollViewer Inherits Control Implements IAddChild, IServiceProvider
public ref class FlowDocumentScrollViewer : System::Windows::Controls::Control, IServiceProvider, System::Windows::Markup::IAddChild
type FlowDocumentScrollViewer = class inherit Control interface IAddChild interface IServiceProvider

summary.span: 提供在連續捲動模式中檢視動態內容的控制項。

span.span: Provides a control for viewing flow content in a continuous scrolling mode.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 顯示內容以連續捲動模式。 shows content in continuous scrolling mode. 類似的控制項， ，會以頁面為一次檢視模式顯示內容。A similar control, , shows content in page-at-a-time viewing mode. 兩者和都有固定的特定檢視模式。Both and are fixed to a particular viewing mode. 相反地，包含可讓使用者動態選擇各種檢視模式功能 (所提供列舉型別)，但代價是較重的加權，比或。On the other hand, includes features that enable the user to dynamically choose between various viewing modes (as provided by the enumeration), at the cost of being heavier weight than or . 下圖顯示控制項，其預設值[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]。The following figure shows a control with its default [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]. ![螢幕擷取畫面： 基本 FlowDocumentScrollViewer](~/add/media/flowdocscrollviewer-main.png "螢幕擷取畫面： 基本 FlowDocumentScrollViewer")![Screenshot: Basic FlowDocumentScrollViewer](~/add/media/flowdocscrollviewer-main.png "Screenshot: Basic FlowDocumentScrollViewer") 預設一定會顯示垂直捲軸，而水平捲動則會視需要顯示。By default, a vertical scrollbar is always shown, and a horizontal scrollbar becomes visible if needed. 預設值[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]for不包含工具列; 不過，屬性可用來啟用內建工具列。The default [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] for does not include a toolbar; however, the property can be used to enable a built-in toolbar. 是唯一允許的子元素。 is the only allowable child element for a . A項目可能會裝載不超過一個。A element may host no more than one . ## Examples 下列範例會定義如上圖所示。The following example defines the pictured in the figure above. [!code-xaml[FloaterFigureSnippets#_FlowDocumentScrollViewerXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FloaterFigureSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#_flowdocumentscrollviewerxaml)]

summary.span: 切換 [尋找] 對話方塊。

span.span: Toggles the **Find** dialog.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設，Ctrl + F，請提供切換的鍵盤快速鍵**尋找**對話方塊。By default, Ctrl+F provides a keyboard shortcut for toggling the **Find** dialog. 下圖顯示**尋找** 對話方塊上的UI 的預設值。The following figure shows the **Find** dialog on a with default UI. ![螢幕擷取畫面： FlowDocumentScrollViewer 尋找對話方塊](~/add/media/flowdocscrollviewer-find.png "螢幕擷取畫面： FlowDocumentScrollViewer 尋找對話方塊")![Screenshot: FlowDocumentScrollViewer find dialog](~/add/media/flowdocscrollviewer-find.png "Screenshot: FlowDocumentScrollViewer find dialog") 預設值**尋找** 對話方塊包含讓您輸入搜尋文字欄位，以及用於按鈕**尋找下一個**，**找上一個**，和**選項**.The default **Find** dialog includes a field for entering search text, as well as buttons for **Find Next**, **Find Previous**, and **Options**. 下列**尋找**預設會提供選項：The following **Find** options are provided by default: - 全字拼寫須相符Match whole word only - 大小寫須相符Match case - 比對讀音符號Match diacritic - 比對 kashidaMatch kashida - 比對 a hamzaMatch alef hamza

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void OnContextMenuOpening(class System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuEventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub OnContextMenuOpening (e As ContextMenuEventArgs)

span.span: Arguments of the event.

summary.span: 當未處理的 路由事件到達其路由中的這個類別時，便會叫用此方法。

span.span: Invoked whenever an unhandled routed event reaches this class in its route.

summary.span: 實作這個方法可為此事件加入類別處理。

span.span: Implement this method to add class handling for this event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法沒有任何預設實作。This method has no default implementation. 如果在繼承的中繼類別已實作此方法，您仍應該呼叫基底實作。You should still call the base implementation in case an intermediate class in the inheritance has implemented this method. 這個方法的目的是有點類似[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]上的事件模式 \* 方法： 它會提供方法來處理從衍生的類別，而不是執行個體處理常式的類別處理常式與相符的事件。The purpose of this method is somewhat similar to [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event pattern On\* methods: it provides the means to handle the matching event from derived classes with a class handler instead of an instance handler. 在此情況下，符合的事件是路由的事件。In this case the matching event is a routed event. On \* 方法的實作模式是不同的路由事件，因為路由的事件可能已引發由子項目，不一定會叫用處理常式，因此您的實作必須接受事件引數的來源項目帳戶屬性 （和不應該嘗試重新引發該事件，在大部分情況下）。The implementation pattern of the On\* methods is different for routed events because the routed event may have been raised by a child element, not necessarily the element that will invoke handlers, so your implementation will need to take the event arguments' source properties into account (and should not try to re-raise the event in most cases). 子類別可以選擇在路由收到事件時呼叫私用類別處理常式方法。Subclasses of could choose to call private class handler methods when the event is received along the route. 一個可能的案例是取得事件的引數，並謹慎地將事件標示為已處理。One potential scenario is to take the arguments of the event and deliberately mark the event as handled.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance class System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer OnCreateAutomationPeer() cil managed

summary.span: 叫用標準 [列印] 對話方塊，可用來列印 的內容，並設定列印喜好設定。

span.span: Invokes a standard **Print** dialog which can be used to print the contents of the and configure printing preferences.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設值 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] neposkytuje**列印** 按鈕。The default [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] does not provide a **Print** button. 下圖顯示的標準範例**列印**對話方塊。The following figure shows an example of a standard **Print** dialog. 請注意，特定的外觀**列印**對話方塊可能會依據主機服務電腦的組態而有所不同。Note that the specific appearance of the **Print** dialog may vary depending on the hosting computer's configuration. ![螢幕擷取畫面: [列印] 對話方塊](~/add/media/flowdocrdr-print.png "螢幕擷取畫面： 列印 對話方塊")![Screenshot: Print dialog box](~/add/media/flowdocrdr-print.png "Screenshot: Print dialog box")

summary.span: 取得或設定目前的縮放層級。

span.span: Gets or sets the current zoom level.

value.span: 目前的縮放層級 (以百分比表示)。

span.span: The current zoom level, interpreted as a percentage.

value.span: 預設值為 100.0 (縮放層級 100%)。

span.span: The default is 100.0 (a zoom level of 100%).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 縮放層級的值受限於和屬性。The zoom level is constrained by the values of the and properties. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None| ## Examples 下列範例示範如何設定屬性。The following example shows how to set the attribute. summary.span: 取得或設定縮放增量。

span.span: Gets or sets the zoom increment.

value.span: 目前的縮放增量 (以百分比表示)。

span.span: The current zoom increment, interpreted as a percentage.

value.span: 預設值為 10.0 (縮放增量 10%)。

span.span: The default is 10.0 (zoom increments by 10%).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 縮放增量是由此百分比層級增加或減少的時機或執行命令，分別。The zoom increment is the percentage by which the level is increased or decreased when the or commands are executed, respectively. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None| ## Examples 下列範例示範如何設定屬性。The following example shows how to set the attribute.
